revision.text:
An '''Electric Egg''' is a type of Pokémon Egg that can hatch Electric-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh |- | Magnemite || | Chinchou || Electrike || Pachirisu |- | Pikachu || | Mareep || Plusle || | |- | Voltorb || | Elekid || Minun || | |- | Electabuzz || | || | || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | Vermillion City || | 1000 Quest Points |- | Sunyshore City || | 1000 Quest Points |} {{Eggs}}
